description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Sibenik, Croatia. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Sea-View Croatia Escape with Infinity Pool & Seven Restaurants & Bars
hotels.description: The unforgettable Adriatic awaits with a breathtaking stay at Croatia’s D-Resort Šibenik, set next to the city's spectacular yacht marina. Designed by famed architect Nikola Bašić, known for Zadar's 'Sea Organ’ installation, this unique hotel gives the feeling of being aboard a large, modern ship, with all rooms enjoying sweeping views across the medieval port. With an infinity pool, multiple restaurants and bars, a kids club and a wellness centre - this resort is a secret you'll want to keep to yourself.

seo.title: Hotel a Sibenik - Croatia Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trova i migliori hotel a Sibenik, Croatia con offerte esclusive. Prenota la tua fuga perfetta con fino al 60% di sconto.
